segment.source: Baum/Humanware/APH/Orbit Braille Displays
segment.target: Baum/Humanware/APH/Orbit brajični redci

segment.source: Several [Baum](https://www.visiobraille.de/index.php?article_id=1&clang=2), [HumanWare](https://www.humanware.com/), [APH](https://www.aph.org/) and [Orbit](https://www.orbitresearch.com/) displays are supported when connected via USB, bluetooth or serial.
segment.target: Nekoliko [Baumovih](https://www.baum.de/cms/en/), [HumanWare-ovih](https://www.humanware.com/), [APH-ovih](https://www.aph.org/) i [Orbitovih](https://www.orbitresearch.com/) brajičnih redaka su podržani kad su spojeni putem usb, bluetooth ili serijske veze.

segment.source: These include:
segment.target: Sljedeći brajični redci su podržani:

segment.source: Baum: SuperVario, PocketVario, VarioUltra, Pronto!, SuperVario2, Vario 340
segment.target: Baum: SuperVario, PocketVario, VarioUltra, Pronto!, SuperVario2, Vario 340

segment.source: HumanWare: Brailliant, BrailleConnect, Brailliant2
segment.target: HumanWare: Brailliant, BrailleConnect, Brailliant2

segment.source: APH: Refreshabraille
segment.target: APH: Refreshabraille

segment.source: Orbit: Orbit Reader 20
segment.target: Orbit: Orbit Reader 20

segment.source: Some other displays manufactured by Baum may also work, though this has not been tested.
segment.target: Neki brajični redci, koje je proizveo baum mogu također raditi, premda to nije isprobano.

segment.source: If connecting via USB to displays which do not use HID, you must first install the USB drivers provided by the manufacturer.
segment.target: Ako spajate brajične redke koji ne koriste hid preko usb veze, morate instalirati usb upravljačke programe proizvođača.

segment.source: The VarioUltra and Pronto! use HID.
segment.target: VarioUltra i Pronto! brajični redci koriste HID.

segment.source: The Refreshabraille and Orbit Reader 20 can use HID if configured appropriately.
segment.target: Refreshabraille i Orbit Reader 20 mogu koristiti HID ako su konfigurirani na određeni način.

segment.source: The USB serial mode of the Orbit Reader 20 is currently only supported in Windows 10 and later.
segment.target: USB serijski način u Orbit Reader 20 brajičnom redku, trenutačno je podržan samo u Windows 10 i novijim inačicama operacijskog sustava.

segment.source: USB HID should generally be used instead.
segment.target: Umjesto toga, trebali biste koristiti USB HID.

segment.target: Slijede prečaci za ove brajične retke s NVDA čitačem.

segment.target: Pomeri brajev red na prethodni red |`d1`

segment.target: Pomeri brajev red na sledeći red |`d3`

segment.source: hedo ProfiLine USB
segment.target: Hedo ProfiLine USB

segment.source: The hedo ProfiLine USB from [hedo Reha-Technik](https://www.hedo.de/) is supported.
segment.target: Hedo ProfiLine USB brajični redak tvrtke [hedo Reha-Technik](https://www.hedo.de/) je podržan.

segment.source: You must first install the USB drivers provided by the manufacturer.
segment.target: Prvo morate instalirati USB upravljačke programe koje je napravio proizvođač.

segment.source: This display does not yet support NVDA's automatic background braille display detection functionality.
segment.target: Ovaj brajični redak još uvijek ne podržava funkcionalnost automatskog otkrivanja brajičnih redaka.

segment.source: HumanWare Brailliant BI/B Series / BrailleNote Touch
segment.target: HumanWare Brailliant BI/B Serije / BrailleNote Touch

segment.source: The Brailliant BI and B series of displays from [HumanWare](https://www.humanware.com/), including the BI 14, BI 32, BI 20X, BI 40, BI 40X and B 80, are supported when connected via USB or bluetooth.
segment.target: Brailliant BI i B serije brajični redci tvrtke [HumanWare](https://www.humanware.com/), uključujući BI 14, BI 32, BI 20X, BI 40, BI 40X B 80 i B 80 su podržani kad su spojeni putem USB ili bluetooth veze.

segment.source: If connecting via USB with the protocol set to HumanWare, you must first install the USB drivers provided by the manufacturer.
segment.target: Ako brajični redak spajate putem USB veze, i protokolom postavljenim na Human Ware prvo morate instalirati USB upravljačke programe koje je napravio proizvođač.

segment.source: USB drivers are not required if the protocol is set to OpenBraille.
segment.target: USB upravljački programi nisu potrebni ako je protokol postavljen na OpenBraille.

segment.source: The following extra devices are also supported (and do not require any special drivers to be installed):
segment.target: Podržani su također slijedeći dodatni uređaji, i za njih nisu potrebni dodatni upravljački programi za korištenje:

segment.source: APH Mantis Q40
segment.target: APH Mantis Q40

segment.source: APH Chameleon 20
segment.target: APH Chameleon 20

segment.source: Humanware BrailleOne
segment.target: Humanware BrailleOne

segment.source: NLS eReader
segment.target: NLS eReader

segment.source: Note that the Zoomax is currently not supported without external drivers
segment.target: Imajte na umu da Zoomax trenutno nije podržan bez vanjskih upravljačkih programa

segment.source: HIMS Braille Sense/Braille EDGE/Smart Beetle/Sync Braille Series
segment.target: HIMS Braille Sense/Braille EDGE/Smart Beetle/Sync Braille serije

segment.source: NVDA supports Braille Sense, Braille EDGE, Smart Beetle and Sync Braille displays from [Hims](https://www.hims-inc.com/) when connected via USB or bluetooth.
segment.target: NVDA podržava Braille Sense, Braille EDGE, Smart Beetle i Sync Braille brajične retke tvrtke [Hims](https://www.hims-inc.com/) kad su spojeni preko USB ili bluetooth veze.

segment.source: If connecting via USB, you will need to install the [USB drivers from HIMS](http://www.himsintl.com/upload/HIMS_USB_Driver_v25.zip) on your system.
segment.target: Ako spajate brajični redak preko Usb priključka, trebat ćete instalirati [USB upravljake programe od Himsa](http://www.himsintl.com/upload/HIMS_USB_Driver_v25.zip) u vaš sustav.

segment.source: Seika Braille Displays
segment.target: Seika brajični redci

segment.source: The following Seika Braille displays from Nippon Telesoft are supported in two groups with different functionality:
segment.target: Slijedeći Seika brajični redci tvrtke Nippon Telesoft su podržani u dvije grupe sa različitim funkcijama:

segment.source: [Seika Version 3, 4, and 5 (40 cells), Seika80 (80 cells)](#SeikaBrailleDisplays)
segment.target: [Seika verzija 3, 4, i 5 (40 znakova), Seika80 (80 znakova)](#SeikaBrailleDisplays)

segment.source: [MiniSeika (16, 24 cells), V6, and V6Pro (40 cells)](#SeikaNotetaker)
segment.target: [MiniSeika (16, 24 znakova), V6, i V6Pro (40 znakova)](#SeikaNotetaker)

segment.source: You can find more information about the displays on their [Demo and Driver Download page](https://en.seika-braille.com/down/index.html).
segment.target: Možete pronaći više informacija o ovim brajičnim redcima [na njihovoj stranici demonstracije i preuzimanja upravljačkih programa](https://en.seika-braille.com/down/index.html).

segment.source: Seika Version 3, 4, and 5 (40 cells), Seika80 (80 cells)
segment.target: Seika verzija 3, 4, i 5 (40 znakova), Seika80 (80 znakova)

segment.source: These displays do not yet support NVDA's automatic background braille display detection functionality.
segment.target: Ovi brajični redci još ne podržavaju funkcionalnost automatskog otkrivanja brajičnih redaka u pozadini.

segment.source: Select "Seika Braille Displays" to manually configure
segment.target: Odaberite "Seika brajični redci" za ručnu konfiguraciju.

segment.source: A device drivers must be installed before using Seika v3/4/5/80.
segment.target: Prije korištenja Seika v3/4/5/80 brajičnog redka, morate instalirati upravljačke programe za uređaj.

segment.source: The drivers are [provided by the manufacturer](https://en.seika-braille.com/down/index.html).
segment.target: Upravljačke programe [pruža proizvođač](https://en.seika-braille.com/down/index.html).

segment.source: The Seika Braille Display key assignments follow.
segment.target: Slijede tipkovnički prečaci za Seika brajični redak.

segment.source: Please see the display's documentation for descriptions of where these keys can be found.
segment.target: Smještaj ovih tipki potražite u dokumentaciji brajičnog retka.

segment.target: Naziv |Tipka

segment.source: Scroll braille display back |left
segment.target: Kliži po brajičnom retku natrag |lijevo

segment.source: Scroll braille display forward |right
segment.target: Kliži po brajičnom retku naprijed |desno

segment.source: Move braille display to previous line |b3
segment.target: Premjesti brajični redak na prethodni redak |b3

segment.source: Move braille display to next line |b4
segment.target: Premjesti brajični redak na sljedeći redak |b4

segment.target: Mijenjaj povezanost brajičnog retka |b5

segment.target: Izgovori sve |b6

segment.target: Tipka tabulator |b1

segment.target: Tipka šift+tabulator |b2

segment.target: Tipka alt+tabulator |b1+b2

segment.target: NVDA Izbornik |lijevo+desno

segment.target: Premjesti se na brajičnu ćeliju |routing

segment.source: MiniSeika (16, 24 cells), V6, and V6Pro (40 cells)
segment.target: MiniSeika (16, 24 znakova), V6, i V6Pro (40 znakova)

segment.source: NVDA's automatic background braille display detection functionality is supported via USB and Bluetooth.
segment.target: NVDA automatsko otkrivanje brajičnih redaka je podržano koristeći USB i Bluetooth.

segment.source: Select "Seika Notetaker" or "auto" to configure.
segment.target: Odaberite "Seika brajična elektronička bilježnica" ili "automatski" kako biste konfigurirali.

segment.source: No extra drivers are required when using a Seika Notetaker braille display.
segment.target: Nisu potrebni dodatni upravljački programi kako bi se koristila Seika brajična elektronička bilježnica.

segment.target: Slijede prečaci za Seika brajičnu elektroničku bilježnicu.

segment.source: Papenmeier BRAILLEX Newer Models
segment.target: Papenmeier BRAILLEX noviji modeli

segment.source: The following Braille displays are supported:
segment.target: Sljedeći brajični redci su podržani:

segment.source: BRAILLEX EL 40c, EL 80c, EL 20c, EL 60c (USB)
segment.target: BRAILLEX EL 40c, EL 80c, EL 20c, EL 60c (USB)

segment.source: BRAILLEX EL 40s, EL 80s, EL 2d80s, EL 70s, EL 66s (USB)
segment.target: BRAILLEX EL 40s, EL 80s, EL 2d80s, EL 70s, EL 66s (USB)

segment.source: BRAILLEX Trio (USB and bluetooth)
segment.target: BRAILLEX Trio (USB i bluetooth)

segment.source: BRAILLEX Live 20, BRAILLEX Live and BRAILLEX Live Plus (USB and bluetooth)
segment.target: BRAILLEX Live 20, BRAILLEX Live i BRAILLEX Live Plus (USB i bluetooth)

segment.source: These displays do not support NVDA's automatic background braille display detection functionality.
segment.target: Ovaj brajični redak još uvijek ne podržava funkcionalnost automatskog otkrivanja brajičnih redaka.

segment.source: There is an option in the display's USB driver which can cause an issue with loading the display.
segment.target: Postoji opcija u upravljačkom programu redka koja može prouzročiti problem prilikom učitavanja redka.

segment.source: Please try the following:
segment.target: Molimo pokušajte slijedeće:

segment.source: Please make sure that you have installed the [latest driver](https://www.papenmeier-rehatechnik.de/en/service/downloadcenter/software/articles/software-braille-devices.html).
segment.target: Uvjerite se da imate instalirane [posljednje upravljačke programe](https://www.papenmeier-rehatechnik.de/en/service/downloadcenter/software/articles/software-braille-devices.html).

segment.source: Open the Windows Device Manager.
segment.target: Otvorite upravitelj uređaja sustava Windows.

segment.source: Scroll down the list to "USB Controllers" or "USB Devices".
segment.target: Pronađite "USB kontrolere" ili "USB uređaje".

segment.source: Select "Papenmeier Braillex USB Device".
segment.target: Odaberite "Papenmeier Braillex USB Device".

segment.source: Open the properties and switch to the "Advanced" tab.
segment.target: Otvorite svojstva i prebacite se na karticu "napredno".

segment.source: Sometimes the "Advanced" tab doesn't appear.
segment.target: Ponekad se kartica "Napredno" ne pojavljuje.

segment.source: If this is the case, disconnect the braille display from the computer, exit NVDA, wait a moment and reconnect the braille display.
segment.target: Ako je to slučaj, odspojite brajični redak od računala, isključite NVDA, pričekajte trenutak i ponovno spojite brajični redak.

segment.source: Repeat this 4 to 5 times if necessary.
segment.target: Ako je potrebno, ponovite to 4 ili 5 puta.

segment.source: If the "Advanced" tab is still not displayed, please restart the computer.
segment.target: Ako se kartica "napredno" još uvijek ne pojavljuje, molimo ponovno pokrenite računalo.

segment.source: Disable the "Load VCP" option.
segment.target: Onemogućite opciju "učitaj VCP".

segment.source: Most devices have an Easy Access Bar (EAB) that allows intuitive and fast operation.
segment.target: Većina uređaja ima tipku Easy Access Bar (EAB) koja omogućuje brzo i intuitivno rukovanje.

segment.source: The EAB can be moved in four directions where generally each direction has two switches.
segment.target: EAB može biti premještan u četiri smjera gdje u glavnom svaki smjer ima dva preklopnika.

segment.source: The C and Live series are the only exceptions to this rule.
segment.target: C i live serije su jedina iznimka od ovog pravila.

segment.source: The c-series and some other displays have two routing rows whereby the upper row is used to report formatting information.
segment.target: C-serija i drugi brajični redci imaju dva reda routing tipki gdje se gornji red koristi za izvještavanje o oblikovanju teksta.

segment.source: Holding one of the upper routing keys and pressing the EAB on c-series devices emulates the second switch state.
segment.target: Kad držite pritisnutu jednu od gornjih routing tipki i pritiščući EAB na uređajima c-serije emulira stanje drugog preklopnika.

segment.source: The live series displays have one routing row only and the EAB has one step per direction.
segment.target: Brajični redci Live serije imaju samo jedan red routing tipki i EAB ima samo jedan korak po smjeru.

segment.source: The second step may be emulated by pressing one of the routing keys and pressing the EAB in the corresponding direction.
segment.target: Drugi se korak može izvesti tako da pritisnete jednu od routing tipki i EAB u odgovarajućem smjeru.

segment.source: Pressing and holding the up, down, right and left keys (or EAB) causes the corresponding action to be repeated.
segment.target: Kad pritisnete i držite gornje, doljnje, desne i lijeve tipke (ili EAB) uzrokuje ponavljanje dodjeljene akcije.

segment.source: Generally, the following keys are available on these braille displays:
segment.target: Sljedeće tipke su općenito dostupne na ovim brajičnim redcima:

segment.source: Name |Key
segment.target: Naziv |Tipka

segment.target: l1 |Lijeva prednja tipka

segment.source: l2 |Left rear key
segment.target: l2 |Lijeva stražnja tipka

segment.source: r1 |Right front key
segment.target: r1 |Desna prednja tipka

segment.source: r2 |Right rear key
segment.target: r2 |Desna stražnja tipka

segment.source: up |1 Step up
segment.target: up |Jedan korak gore

segment.source: up2 |2 Steps up
segment.target: up2 |Dva koraka gore

segment.source: left |1 Step left
segment.target: left |Jedan korak lijevo

segment.source: left2 |2 Steps left
segment.target: left2 |Dva koraka lijevo

segment.source: right |1 Step right
segment.target: right |Jedan korak desno

segment.source: right2 |2 Steps right
segment.target: right2 |Dva koraka desno

segment.source: dn |1 Step down
segment.target: dn |Jedan korak dolje

segment.source: dn2 |2 Steps down
segment.target: dn2 |Dva koraka dolje

segment.source: The Trio model has four additional keys which are in front of the braille keyboard.
segment.target: Trio model ima četiri dodatne tipke koje se nalaze na prednjoj strani brajične tipkovnice.

segment.source: These are (ordered from left to right):
segment.target: To su sljedeće tipke (redoslijed s lijeva na desno):

segment.source: left thumb key (lt)
segment.target: lijeva palčana tipka (lt)

segment.source: space
segment.target: razmaknica

segment.source: space
segment.target: razmaknica

segment.source: right thumb key (rt)
segment.target: desna palčana tipka (rt)

segment.source: Currently, the right thumb key is not in use.
segment.target: Trenutačno se ne koristi desna palčana tipka.

segment.source: The inner keys are both mapped to space.
segment.target: Obje srednje tipke su mapirane na razmaknicu.

segment.source: Name |Key
segment.target: Naziv |Tipka

segment.source: escape key |space with dot 7
segment.target: Tipka escape |razmaknica s točkicom 7

segment.source: upArrow key |space with dot 2
segment.target: Tipka strelica gore |razmaknica s točkicom 2

segment.source: leftArrow key |space with dot 1
segment.target: Tipka strelica lijevo |razmaknica s točkicom 1

segment.source: rightArrow key |space with dot 4
segment.target: Tipka strelica desno |razmaknica s točkicom 4

segment.source: downArrow |space with dot 5
segment.target: Tipka strelica dolje |razmaknica s točkicom 5

segment.source: control key |lt+dot2
segment.target: Tipka kontrol |lijeva palčana tipka+točkica2

segment.source: alt key |lt+dot3
segment.target: Tipka alt |lijeva palčana tipka+točkica3

segment.source: control+escape key |space with dot 1 2 3 4 5 6
segment.target: Tipka kontrol+escape |razmaknica s točkicama 1 2 3 4 5 6

segment.source: tab key |space with dot 3 7
segment.target: Tipka tabulator |razmaknica s točkicama 3 7

segment.source: Papenmeier Braille BRAILLEX Older Models
segment.target: Papenmeier Braille BRAILLEX stariji modeli

segment.source: The following Braille displays are supported:
segment.target: Sljedeći su brajični redci podržani:

segment.source: BRAILLEX EL 80, EL 2D-80, EL 40 P
segment.target: BRAILLEX EL 80, EL 2D-80, EL 40 P

segment.source: BRAILLEX Tiny, 2D Screen
segment.target: BRAILLEX Tiny, 2D Screen

segment.source: Note that these displays can only be connected via a serial port.
segment.target: Imajte na umu da se ovi brajični redci mogu spojiti samo preko serijskog priključka.

segment.source: Due to this, these displays do not support NVDA's automatic background braille display detection functionality.
segment.target: Zbog ovoga, ovi brajični redci ne podržavaju automatsko otkrivanje brajičnih redaka.

segment.source: You should select the port to which the display is connected after you have chosen this driver in the [Select Braille Display](#SelectBrailleDisplay) dialog.
segment.target: Poslije izbora brajičnog retka, morat ćete odabrati priključak u [dijaloškom okviru odabir brajičnog retka](#SelectBrailleDisplay).

segment.source: Some of these devices have an Easy Access Bar (EAB) that allows intuitive and fast operation.
segment.target: Neki od ovih uređaja imaju Easy Access Bar (EAB) tipku koja omogućuje intuitivno i brzo rukovanje.

segment.source: The EAB can be moved in four directions where generally each direction has two switches.
segment.target: EAB se može pomicati u četiri smjera gdje uglavnom svaki smjer ima dva preklopnika.

segment.source: Pressing and holding the up, down, right and left keys (or EAB) causes the corresponding action to be repeated.
segment.target: Kad pritišćete i držite gornju, doljnju, desnu i lijevu tipku (ili EAB) Prouzrokuje ponavljanje dodjeljene akcije.

segment.source: Older devices do not have an EAB; front keys are used instead.
segment.target: Stariji uređaji nemaju EAB; tipke s prednje strane se koriste umjesto EAB.

segment.source: Generally, the following keys are available on braille displays:
segment.target: Na brajičnim redcima su općenito dostupne sljedeće tipke:

segment.target: l1 |Lijeva prednja tipka

segment.target: l2 |Lijeva stražnja tipka

segment.target: r1 |Desna prednja tipka

segment.target: r2 |Desna stražnja tipka

segment.source: HumanWare BrailleNote
segment.target: HumanWare BrailleNote

segment.source: NVDA supports the BrailleNote notetakers from [Humanware](https://www.humanware.com) when acting as a display terminal for a screen reader.
segment.target: NVDA podržava BrailleNote elektroničke bilježnice tvrtke [Humanware](https://www.humanware.com) Kad se ponašaju kao brajični redci za čitače ekrana.

segment.source: The following models are supported:
segment.target: Sljedeći modeli su podržani:

segment.source: BrailleNote Classic (serial connection only)
segment.target: BrailleNote Classic (samo serijska veza)

segment.source: BrailleNote PK (Serial and bluetooth connections)
segment.target: BrailleNote PK (serijska i bluetooth veza)

segment.source: BrailleNote MPower (Serial and bluetooth connections)
segment.target: BrailleNote MPower (Serijska i Bluetooth veza)

segment.source: BrailleNote Apex (USB and Bluetooth connections)
segment.target: BrailleNote Apex (USB i bluetooth veza)

segment.source: For BrailleNote Touch, please refer to the [Brailliant BI Series / BrailleNote Touch](#HumanWareBrailliant) section.
segment.target: Za BrailleNote Touch, pogledajte poglavlje [Brailliant BI serije / BrailleNote Touch](#HumanWareBrailliant).

segment.source: Except for BrailleNote PK, both braille (BT) and QWERTY (QT) keyboards are supported.
segment.target: Izuzimajući BrailleNote PK, braille (BT) i QWERTY (QT) tipkovnice su podržane.

segment.source: For BrailleNote QT, PC keyboard emulation isn't supported.
segment.target: Za BrailleNote QT, emulacija tipkovnice osobnog računala nije podržana.

segment.source: You can also enter braille dots using the QT keyboard.
segment.target: Moguće je također upisivanje brajice koristeći qwerty tipkovnicu.

segment.source: Please check the braille terminal section of the BrailleNote manual guide for details.
segment.target: Pogledajte poglavlje brajični terminal Braillenote korisničkih uputa za više informacija.

segment.source: If your device supports more than one type of connection, when connecting your BrailleNote to NVDA, you must set the braille terminal port in braille terminal options.
segment.target: Ako vaš uređaj podržava više od jedne vrste veze, kad spajate vaš BrailleNote za korištenje s NVDA, morate postaviti priključak brajičnog terminala u postavkama brajičnog terminala.

segment.source: Please check the BrailleNote manual for details.
segment.target: Za više informacija, pogledajte korisničke upute za BrailleNote elektroničku bilježnicu.

segment.source: In NVDA, you may also need to set the port in the [Select Braille Display](#SelectBrailleDisplay) dialog.
segment.target: U NVDA ćete možda trebati odabrati priključak u [dijaloškom okviru odabir brajičnog retka](#SelectBrailleDisplay).

segment.source: If you are connecting via USB or bluetooth, you can set the port to "Automatic", "USB" or "Bluetooth", depending on the available choices.
segment.target: Ako povezujete uređaj putem USB ili bluetooth veze, možete postaviti priključak na "Automatski", "USB" ili "Bluetooth", ovisno o dostupnim opcijama.

segment.source: If connecting using a legacy serial port (or a USB to serial converter) or if none of the previous options appear, you must explicitly choose the communication port to be used from the list of hardware ports.
segment.target: Ako za spajanje koristite serijski priključak (ili pretvarač sa serijskog priključka na USB) ili se ne pojavljuje niti jedna od prethodnih opcija, morate točno odabrati komunikacijski priključak koji će se koristiti pri komunikaciji s uređajem.

segment.source: Before connecting your BrailleNote Apex using its USB client interface, you must install the drivers provided by HumanWare.
segment.target: Prije spajanja vašeg BrailleNote Apex uz pomoć njegovog Usb klijenta, morate instalirati upravljačke programe koje je napravila tvrtka Human Ware.

segment.source: On the BrailleNote Apex BT, you can use the scroll wheel located between dots 1 and 4 for various NVDA commands.
segment.target: Na BrailleNote Apex BT, možete koristiti kotačić koji se nalazi između točkica 1 i 4 za različite NVDA prečace.

segment.source: The wheel consists of four directional dots, a centre click button, and a wheel that spins clockwise or counterclockwise.
segment.target: Kotačić se sastoji od četiri usmjerene točke, centralnog gumba za klikanje i kotačića koji se može vrtiti u smjeru ili obrnuto od smjera kazaljke na satu.

segment.source: Following are the BrailleNote command assignments for NVDA.
segment.target: Slijede BrailleNote prečaci za NVDA.

segment.source: Please check your BrailleNote's documentation to find where these keys are located.
segment.target: Smještaj ovih tipki potražite u BrailleNote dokumentaciji.

segment.source: EcoBraille
segment.target: EcoBraille

segment.source: NVDA supports EcoBraille displays from [ONCE](https://www.once.es/).
segment.target: NVDA podržava EcoBraille brajične retke koje proizvodi [ONCE](https://www.once.es/).

segment.source: The following models are supported:
segment.target: Sljedeći modeli su podržani:

segment.source: EcoBraille 20
segment.target: EcoBraille 20

segment.source: EcoBraille 40
segment.target: EcoBraille 40

segment.source: EcoBraille 80
segment.target: EcoBraille 80

segment.source: EcoBraille Plus
segment.target: EcoBraille Plus

segment.source: In NVDA, you can set the serial port to which the display is connected in the [Select Braille Display](#SelectBrailleDisplay) dialog.
segment.target: U NVDA čitaču možete odabrati priključak na koji je spojen brajični redak u dijaloškom okviru [Odaberi brajični redak](#SelectBrailleDisplay).

segment.source: These displays do not support NVDA's automatic background braille display detection functionality.
segment.target: NVDA ne podržava funkcionalnost automatskog otkrivanja brajičnih redaka za ovaj brajični redak.

segment.source: Following are the key assignments for EcoBraille displays.
segment.target: Slijede prečaci za EcoBraille brajične retke.

segment.source: Please see the [EcoBraille documentation](ftp://ftp.once.es/pub/utt/bibliotecnia/Lineas_Braille/ECO/) for descriptions of where these keys can be found.
segment.target: Smještaj ovih tipki potražite u [EcoBraille dokumentaciji](ftp://ftp.once.es/pub/utt/bibliotecnia/Lineas_Braille/ECO/).

segment.source: Name |Key
segment.target: Naziv |Tipka

segment.source: Scroll braille display back |T2
segment.target: Kliži po brajičnom retku natrag |T2

segment.source: Scroll braille display forward |T4
segment.target: Kliži po brajičnom retku naprijed |T4

segment.source: Move braille display to previous line |T1
segment.target: Premjesti brajični redak na prethodni redak |T1

segment.source: Move braille display to next line |T5
segment.target: Premjesti brajični redak na sljedeći redak |T5

segment.source: Route to braille cell |Routing
segment.target: Premjesti se na brajičnu ćeliju |Routing

segment.source: Activate current navigator object |T3
segment.target: Aktiviraj trenutačni navigacijski objekt |T3

segment.source: Switch to next review mode |F1
segment.target: Prebaci na sljedeći modus pregleda |F1

segment.source: Move to containing object |F2
segment.target: Premjesti se na sadržavajući objekt |F2

segment.target: Prebaci na prethodni modus pregleda |F3

segment.target: Premjesti se na prethodni objekt |F4

segment.target: Izvijesti o trenutačnom objektu |F5

segment.target: Premjesti se na sljedeći objekt |F6

segment.target: Premjesti se na objekt fokusa |F7

segment.target: Premjesti se na prvi sadržavajući objekt |F8

segment.target: Premjesti fokus sustava ili kursor na trenutačnu poziciju pregleda |F9

segment.source: SuperBraille
segment.target: SuperBraille

segment.source: The SuperBraille device, mostly available in Taiwan, can be connected to by either USB or serial.
segment.target: Uređaj SuperBraille, pretežno dostupan na Tajvanu, može se spajati putem serijskog ili USB priključka.

segment.source: As the SuperBraille does not have any physical typing keys or scrolling buttons, all input must be performed via a standard computer keyboard.
segment.target: Budući da SuperBraille nema nikakvih fizičkih tipki za pisanje ili gumbova za klizanje, svi znakovi se moraju unositi pomoću standardne tipkovnice računala.

segment.source: Due to this, and to maintain compatibility with other screen readers in Taiwan, two key bindings for scrolling the braille display have been provided:
segment.target: Zbog toga, te kako bi se zadržala kompatibilnost s drugim čitačima ekrana na Tajvanu, dodana su dva tipkovnička prečaca za klizanje po brajičnom retku:

segment.source: Name |Key
segment.target: Naziv |Tipka

segment.source: Scroll braille display back |numpadMinus
segment.target: Kliži po brajičnom retku natrag |numMinus

segment.source: Scroll braille display forward |numpadPlus
segment.target: Kliži po brajičnom retku naprijed |numPlus

segment.source: Eurobraille displays
segment.target: Eurobraille brajični redci

segment.source: The b.book, b.note, Esys, Esytime and Iris displays from Eurobraille are supported by NVDA.
segment.target: b.book, b.note, Esys, Esytime i Iris brajični redci tvrtke Eurobraille su podržani.

segment.source: These devices have a braille keyboard with 10 keys.
segment.target: Ovi uređaji imaju brajičnu tipkovnicu sa 10 tipaka.

segment.source: Please refer to the display's documentation for descriptions of these keys.
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte dokumentaciju brajevog reda za opis ovih tastera.

segment.source: Of the two keys placed like a space bar, the left key is corresponding to the backspace key and the right key to the space key.
segment.target: Od dva tastera koji izgledaju slično razmaku, levi taster je backspace i desni je razmak.

segment.source: These devices are connected via USB and have one stand-alone USB keyboard.
segment.target: Ovi uređaji se povezuju putem USB veze i imaju jednu samostalnu USB tastaturu.

segment.source: It is possible to enable/disable this keyboard by toggling "HID Keyboard simulation" using an input gesture.
segment.target: Moguće je omogućiti ili onemogućiti ovu tastaturu menjanjem opcije "HID simulacija tastature" korišćenjem ulazne komande.

segment.source: The braille keyboard functions described directly below is when "HID Keyboard simulation" is disabled.
segment.target: Funkcije brajeve tastature koje su opisane ispod važe kada je "HID simulacija tastature" onemogućena.

segment.source: Braille keyboard functions
segment.target: Funkcije brajeve tastature

segment.target: Naziv |Prečac

segment.source: Nattiq nBraille Displays
segment.target: Nattiq nBraille redovi

segment.source: NVDA supports displays from [Nattiq Technologies](https://www.nattiq.com/) when connected via USB.
segment.target: NVDA podržava redove kompanije [Nattiq Technologies](https://www.nattiq.com/) kada se povežu putem USB-a.

segment.source: Windows 10 and later detects the Braille Displays once connected, you may need to install USB drivers if using older versions of Windows (below Win10).
segment.target: Windows 10 i noviji prepoznaju redove kada se povežu, možda ćete morati da instalirate drajvere ako koristite starije verzije Windowsa (starije od Win10).

segment.source: You can get them from the manufacturer's website.
segment.target: Možete ih preuzeti sa sajta proizvođača.

segment.source: Following are the key assignments for Nattiq Technologies displays with NVDA.
segment.target: Slede komande za Nattiq Technologies redove uz NVDA.

segment.source: Please see the display's documentation for descriptions of where these keys can be found.
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte dokumentaciju brajevog reda da biste pročitali opise tastera kao i gde se oni nalaze.

segment.source: Name |Key
segment.target: Ime |Taster

segment.source: Scroll braille display back |up
segment.target: Pomeri brajev red nazad |Gore

segment.source: Scroll braille display forward |down
segment.target: Pomeri brajev red napred |Dole

segment.source: Move braille display to previous line |left
segment.target: Pomeri brajev red na prethodni red |Levo

segment.source: Move braille display to next line |right
segment.target: Pomeri brajev red na sledeći red |Desno

segment.source: Route to braille cell |routing
segment.target: Prebaci se na brajevu ćeliju |routing

segment.source: BRLTTY
segment.target: BRLTTY

segment.source: [BRLTTY](https://www.brltty.app/) is a separate program which can be used to support many more braille displays.
segment.target: [BRLTTY](https://www.brltty.app/) je program koji se može koristiti za podršku puno više brajičnih redaka.

segment.source: In order to use this, you need to install [BRLTTY for Windows](https://www.brltty.app/download.html).
segment.target: Da biste ga mogli koristiti, morate instalirati [BRLTTY za Windows](https://www.brltty.app/download.html).

segment.source: You should download and install the latest installer package, which will be named, for example, brltty-win-4.2-2.exe.
segment.target: Trebali biste preuzeti i instalirati aktualnu verziju instalacijskog paketa, koji se na primjer zove, brltty-win-4.2-2.exe.

segment.source: When configuring the display and port to use, be sure to pay close attention to the instructions, especially if you are using a USB display and already have the manufacturer's drivers installed.
segment.target: Kad podešavate brajični redak i priključak za korištenje, budite sigurni da strogo pratite upute, pogotovo ako koristite USB brajični redak i ako već imate instalirane upravljačke programe proizvođača.

segment.source: For displays which have a braille keyboard, BRLTTY currently handles braille input itself.
segment.target: Za brajične retke koji imaju brajičnu tipkovnicu, BRLTTY trenutačno samostalno rukuje brajičnim unosom.

segment.source: Therefore, NVDA's braille input table setting is not relevant.
segment.target: Stoga, postavka za ulaznu brajičnu tablicu nije bitna.

segment.source: BRLTTY is not involved in NVDA's automatic background braille display detection functionality.
segment.target: BRLTTY ne sudjeluje u automatskom otkrivanju brajičnih redaka.

segment.source: Following are the BRLTTY command assignments for NVDA.
segment.target: Slijede BRLTTY prečaci za NVDA.

segment.source: Please see the [BRLTTY key binding lists](https://brltty.app/doc/KeyBindings/) for information about how BRLTTY commands are mapped to controls on braille displays.
segment.target: Pogledajte [BRLTTY tablice tipkovničkih prečaca](https://brltty.app/doc/KeyBindings/) za više informacija o tome kako su BRLTTY prečaci dodijeljeni kontrolama na brajičnim redcima.

segment.source: Name |BRLTTY command
segment.target: Naziv |BRLTTY naredba

segment.source: Scroll braille display back |`fwinlt` (go left one window)
segment.target: Kliži po brajičnom retku natrag |`fwinlt` (idi jedan prozor u lijevo)

segment.source: Scroll braille display forward |`fwinrt` (go right one window)
segment.target: Kliži po brajičnom retku naprijed |`fwinrt` (idi jedan prozor u desno)

segment.source: Move braille display to previous line |`lnup` (go up one line)
segment.target: Premjesti brajični redak na prethodni redak |`lnup` (idi jedan redak gore)

segment.source: Move braille display to next line |`lndn` (go down one line)
segment.target: Premjesti brajični redak na sljedeći redak |`lndn` (idi jedan redak dolje)

segment.source: Route to braille cell |`route` (bring cursor to character)
segment.target: Premjesti se na brajičnu ćeliju |`route` (dovedi kursor na znak)

segment.source: Toggle input help |`learn` (enter/leave command learn mode)
segment.target: Uključi pomoć tipkovnice |`learn` (uključuje način učenja tipkovnice)

segment.source: Open the NVDA menu |`prefmenu` (enter/leave preferences menu)
segment.target: Otvori NVDA izbornik |`prefmenu` (otvara izlazi iz izbornika postavki)

segment.source: Revert configuration |`prefload` (restore preferences from disk)
segment.target: Vrati konfiguraciju |`prefload` (vraća postavke s diska)

segment.source: Save configuration |`prefsave` (save preferences to disk)
segment.target: Spremi konfiguraciju |`prefsave` (sprema postavke na disk)

segment.source: Report time |`time` (show current date and time)
segment.target: Čitaj vrijeme |`time` (pokazuje trenutni datum i vrijeme)

segment.source: Speak the line where the review cursor is located |`say_line` (speak current line)
segment.target: Čitaj redak gdje se nalazi pregledni kursor |`say_line` (izgovara trenutni redak)

segment.source: Say all using review cursor |`say_below` (speak from current line through bottom of screen)
segment.target: Čitaj sve koristeći pregledni kursor |`say_below` (izgovara od trenutnog redka do kraja)

segment.source: Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80
segment.target: Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80

segment.source: The Caiku Albatross devices, which were manufactured by Tivomatic and available in Finland, can be connected to by either USB or serial.
segment.target: Caiku Albatross uređaji, koje je proizvela kompanija Tivomatic i koji su dostupni u Finskoj, mogu se povezati putem USB ili serijske veze.

segment.source: You do not need any specific drivers to be installed to use these displays.
segment.target: Ne morate da instalirate određene drajvere da biste koristili ove redove.

segment.source: Just plug in the display and configure NVDA to use it.
segment.target: Jednostavno povežite red i podesite NVDA da ga koristi.

segment.source: Note: Baud rate 19200 is strongly recommended.
segment.target: Napomena: Baud rate 19200 se posebno preporučuje.

segment.source: If required, switch Baud rate setting value to 19200 from the braille device's menu.
segment.target: Ako je neophodno, promenite vrednost podešavanja Baud rate na 19200 iz menija brajevog uređaja.

segment.source: Although the driver supports 9600 baud rate, it has no way to control what baud rate the display uses.
segment.target: Iako drajver podržava 9600 baud rate, nema način da kontroliše koji baud rate red koristi.

segment.source: Because 19200 is the display default baud rate, the driver tries it at first.
segment.target: Zato što je 19200 podrazumevani baud rate za red, drajver će ovo prvo pokušati.

segment.source: If baud rates are not the same, the driver may behave unexpectedly.
segment.target: Ako baud rate nisu iste, drajver će se možda ponašati neočekivano.

segment.source: Following are key assignments for these displays with NVDA.
segment.target: Slede dodeljene tasterske prečice za ovaj brajev red uz NVDA.

segment.source: Please see the display's documentation for descriptions of where these keys can be found.
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte dokumentaciju brajevog reda za opis gde se ovi tasteri nalaze.

segment.source: Name |Key
segment.target: Ime |Prečica

segment.source: Move to top line in review |`home1`, `home2`
segment.target: Prebaci se na prvi red pregleda |`home1`, `home2`

segment.source: Move to bottom line in review |`end1`, `end2`
segment.target: Prebaci se na poslednji red pregleda |`end1`, `end2`

segment.source: Sets the navigator object to the current focus |`eCursor1`, `eCursor2`
segment.target: Prebaci navigacioni objekat na trenutni fokus |`eKursor1`, `eKursor2`

segment.source: Move to current focus |`cursor1`, `cursor2`
segment.target: Prebaci se na trenutni fokus |`kursor1`, `kursor2`

segment.source: Standard HID Braille displays
segment.target: Standardni HID brajični retci

segment.source: This is an experimental driver for the new Standard HID Braille Specification, agreed upon in 2018 by Microsoft, Google, Apple and several assistive technology companies including NV Access.
segment.target: Ovo je eksperimentalni upravljački program za novu standardnu HID specifikaciju, oko koje su se dogovorili Microsoft, Google, Apple i neke druge tvrtke koje proizvode asistivnu tehnologiju u 2018. godini uključujući i NV Access.

segment.source: The hope is that all future Braille Display models created by any manufacturer, will use this standard protocol which will remove the need for manufacturer-specific Braille drivers.
segment.target: Nadamo se da će bilo koji model brajičnog redka kojeg će proizvesti bilo koji proizvođač koristiti ovaj standardni protokol, što će ukloniti potrebu pisanja upravljačkih programa koji su specifični za bilo kojeg proizvođača.

segment.source: NVDA's automatic braille display detection will also recognize any display that supports this protocol.
segment.target: NVDA funkcija automatskog prepoznavanja brajičnih redaka će prepoznavati bilo koji brajični redak koji podržava ovaj protokol.

segment.source: Following are the current key assignments for these displays.
segment.target: Slijede dodjeljeni prečaci za te brajične retke.

segment.source: Name |Key
segment.target: Naziv |prečac

segment.target: premještanje brajičnog retka u natrag |pan left ili rocker up

segment.target: Premještanje brajičnog redka u naprijed |pan right ili rocker down

segment.target: premjesti se na brajičnu ćeliju |routing set 1

segment.target: prebacuje prikazivanje fokusa |up+down

segment.target: Strelica gore |joystick up, dpad up ili razmaknica+točkica1

segment.target: strelica dolje |joystick down, dpad down ili razmaknica+točkica4

segment.target: strelica lijevo |razmaknica+točkica3, joystick left ili dpad left

segment.target: shift+tab tipka |razmak+točkica1+točkica3

segment.source: Advanced Topics
segment.target: Teme za napredne korisnike

segment.source: Secure Mode
segment.target: Bezbedan način rada

segment.source: System administrators may wish to configure NVDA to restrict unauthorized system access.
segment.target: Administratori sistema će možda želeti da podese NVDA tako da mu se ograniči neovlašćen pristup sistemu.

segment.source: NVDA allows the installation of custom add-ons, which can execute arbitrary code, including when NVDA is elevated to administrator privileges.
segment.target: NVDA dozvoljava instalaciju prilagođenih dodataka, koji mogu da izvrše i pokrenu kod, što uključuje kada NVDA ima administratorske privilegije.

segment.source: NVDA also allows users to execute arbitrary code through the NVDA Python Console.
segment.target: NVDA takođe dozvoljava korisnicima da pokrenu kod kroz NVDA Python konzolu.

segment.source: NVDA secure mode prevents users from modifying their NVDA configuration, and otherwise limits unauthorized system access.
segment.target: NVDA bezbedan režim sprečava da korisnici menjaju njihova NVDA podešavanja, i na druge načine ograničava pristup sistemu.

segment.source: NVDA runs in secure mode when executed on [secure screens](#SecureScreens), unless the `serviceDebug` [system wide parameter](#SystemWideParameters) is enabled.
segment.target: NVDA se pokreće u bezbednom načinu rada na [bezbednim ekranima](#SecureScreens), osim ako se ne omogući `serviceDebug` [sistemski parametar](#SystemWideParameters).

segment.source: To force NVDA to always start in secure mode, set the `forceSecureMode` [system wide parameter](#SystemWideParameters).
segment.target: Da naterate NVDA da se uvek pokrene u bezbednom režimu, podesite `forceSecureMode` [sistemski parameta](#SystemWideParameters).

segment.source: NVDA can also be started in secure mode with the `-s` [command line option](#CommandLineOptions).
segment.target: NVDA se takođe može pokrenuti u bezbednom režimu uz `-s` [opciju komandne linije](#CommandLineOptions).

segment.source: Secure mode disables:
segment.target: Bezbedan način rada će onemogućiti:

segment.source: Saving configuration and other settings to disk
segment.target: Čuvanje konfiguracije i drugih podešavanja na disku

segment.source: Saving the gesture map to disk
segment.target: Čuvanje mape komandi na disku

segment.source: [Configuration Profile](#ConfigurationProfiles) features such as creation, deletion, renaming profiles etc.
segment.target: Opcije [profila podešavanja](#ConfigurationProfiles) kao što su pravljenje, brisanje, preimenovanje profila i slično.

segment.source: Loading custom configuration folders using [the `-c` command line option](#CommandLineOptions)
segment.target: Učitavanje prilagođenih mapa konfiguracije korištenjem [opcije `-c` u naredbenom redku](#CommandLineOptions)

segment.source: Updating NVDA and creating portable copies
segment.target: Ažuriranje programa NVDA i pravljenje prenosnih kopija

segment.source: The [Add-on Store](#AddonsManager)
segment.target: [Prodavnicu dodataka](#AddonsManager)

segment.source: The [NVDA Python console](#PythonConsole)
segment.target: [NVDA Python konzolu](#PythonConsole)

segment.source: The [Log Viewer](#LogViewer) and logging
segment.target: [Preglednik dnevnika](#LogViewer) i evidentiranje u dnevniku

segment.source: The [Braille Viewer](#BrailleViewer) and [Speech Viewer](#SpeechViewer)
segment.target: [Pregled brajice](#BrailleViewer) i [Pregled govora](#SpeechViewer)

segment.source: Opening external documents from the NVDA menu, such as the user guide or contributors file.
segment.target: Otvaranje eksternih dokumenata iz NVDA menija, kao što su korisničko uputstvo ili datoteku saradnika.

segment.source: Installed copies of NVDA store their configuration including add-ons in `%APPDATA%\nvda`.
segment.target: Instalirane kopije programa NVDA čuvaju podešavanja uključujući dodatke u `%APPDATA%\nvda`.

segment.source: To prevent NVDA users from modifying their configuration or add-ons directly, user access to this folder must also be restricted.
segment.target: Da biste sprečili NVDA korisnike da direktno izmene podešavanja ili dodatke, korisnički pristup ovom folderu se takođe mora ograničiti.

segment.source: Secure mode is ineffective for portable copies of NVDA.
segment.target: Siguran način je neefektivan za prijenosne kopije NVDA.

segment.source: This limitation also applies to the temporary copy of NVDA which runs when launching the installer.
segment.target: Ovo ograničenje se primjenjuje i na privremenu kopiju koju porećete kada instalirate NVDA.

segment.source: In secure environments, a user being able to run a portable executable is the same security risk regardless of secure mode.
segment.target: U sigurnim okruženjima, korisnik koji može pokrenuti prijenosnu izvršnu datoteku je isti rizik za sigurnost neovisno o sigurnom načinu.

segment.source: It is expected that system administrators restrict unauthorized software from running on their systems, including portable copies of NVDA.
segment.target: Očekuje se da administratori sustava ograničavaju pokretanje neautoriziranog softvera u svojim sustavima, uključujući prijenosne kopije NVDA.

segment.source: NVDA users often rely on configuring their NVDA profile to suit their needs.
segment.target: NVDA korisnici često zavise od podešavanja njihovog NVDA profila kako bi zadovoljio njihove potrebe.

segment.source: This may include installing and configuring custom add-ons, which should be vetted independently to NVDA.
segment.target: Ovo može uključiti instalaciju i podešavanje prilagođenih dodataka, koje treba pregledati nezavisno od programa NVDA.

segment.source: Secure mode freezes changes to NVDA configuration, so please ensure that NVDA is configured appropriately before forcing secure mode.
segment.target: Bezbedni režim će onemogućiti promene podešavanja, tako da prvo treba osigurati da je NVDA podešen pre nego što prisilite bezbedan režim.

segment.source: Secure Screens
segment.target: Bezbedni ekrani

segment.source: NVDA runs in [secure mode](#SecureMode) when executed on secure screens unless the `serviceDebug` [system wide parameter](#SystemWideParameters) is enabled.
segment.target: NVDA se pokreće u [bezbednom načinu rada](#SecureMode) kada je pokrenut na bezbednim ekranima osim ako je omogućen `serviceDebug` [sistemski parametar](#SystemWideParameters).

segment.source: When running from a secure screen, NVDA uses a system profile for preferences.
segment.target: Kada je pokrenut sa bezbednog ekrana, NVDA koristi sistemski profil za podešavanja.

segment.source: NVDA user preferences can be copied [for use in secure screens](#GeneralSettingsCopySettings).
segment.target: NVDA korisnička podešavanja se mogu kopirati [za korišćenje na bezbednim ekranima](#GeneralSettingsCopySettings).

segment.source: Secure screens include:
segment.target: Bezbedni ekrani uključuju:

segment.source: The Windows sign-in screen
segment.target: Windows ekran za prijavljivanje

segment.source: The User Access Control dialog, active when performing an action as an administrator
segment.target: Dijalog kontrole korisničkog naloga, koji je aktivan kada se izvršava neka radnja kao administrator

segment.source: This includes installing programs
segment.target: Ovo uključuje instalaciju programa

segment.source: Command Line Options
segment.target: Opcije naredbenog retka

segment.source: NVDA can accept one or more additional options when it starts which alter its behaviour.
segment.target: Tijekom pokretanja, NVDA može prihvatiti jednu ili više opcija, čime se mijenja ponašanje čitača.

segment.source: You can pass as many options as you need.
segment.target: Možete proslijediti onoliko opcija koliko trebate.

segment.source: These options can be passed when starting from a shortcut (in the shortcut properties), from the Run dialog (Start Menu -> Run or Windows+r) or from a Windows command console.
segment.target: Ove se opcije mogu proslijediti kad se NVDA pokreće putem prečaca na radnoj površini (u postavkama prečaca), iz dijaloškog okvira "Pokreni" (izbornik Start>Pokreni ili prečac Windows+r) ili iz Windowsovog naredbenog retka.

segment.source: Options should be separated from the name of NVDA's executable file and from other options by spaces.
segment.target: Opcije moraju biti odvojene od imena NVDA izvršne datoteke i od drugih opcija razmacima.

segment.source: For example, a useful option is `--disable-addons`, which tells NVDA to suspend all running add-ons.
segment.target: Na primjer, korisna opcija je `--disable-addons`, koja govori NVDA čitaču da se pokrene bez dodataka.

segment.source: This allows you to determine whether a problem is caused by an add-on and to recover from serious problems caused by add-ons.
segment.target: Ovo vam pomaže otkriti je li problem nastao zbog dodatka i omogućuje oporavljanje od ozbiljnih problema koje dodaci mogu prouzročiti.

segment.source: As an example, you can exit the currently running copy of NVDA by entering the following in the Run dialog:
segment.target: Na primjer, iz trenutačno pokrenute kopije NVDA čitača možete izaći upisom sljedeće opcije u dijaloški okvir "Pokreni":

segment.source: nvda -q
segment.target: nvda -q

segment.source: Some of the command line options have a short and a long version, while some of them have only a long version.
segment.target: Neke opcije naredbenog retka imaju dugu i kratku verziju, dok neke od njih imaju samo dugu verziju.

segment.source: For those which have a short version, you can combine them like this:
segment.target: Za opcije koje imaju kratku verziju, možete ih kombinirati na sljedeće načine:

segment.source: `nvda -mc CONFIGPATH` |This will start NVDA with startup sounds and message disabled, and the specified configuration
segment.target: `nvda -mc CONFIGPATH` |Ovo će pokrenuti NVDA sa zvukom za pokretanje i isključenim porukama, i sa određenom konfiguracijom

segment.source: `nvda -mc CONFIGPATH --disable-addons` |Same as above, but with add-ons disabled
segment.target: `nvda -mc CONFIGPATH --disable-addons` |Ista opcija kao i prethodna, ali s deaktiviranim dodacima

segment.source: Some of the command line options accept additional parameters; e.g. how detailed the logging should be or the path to the user configuration directory.
segment.target: Neke opcije naredbenog retka prihvaćaju dodatne parametre; npr. koliko će zapisivanje u zapisnik biti detaljno ili staza do korisničke konfiguracijske mape.

segment.source: Those parameters should be placed after the option, separated from the option by a space when using the short version or an equals sign (`=`) when using the long version; e.g.:
segment.target: Ovi parametri trebaju biti smješteni poslije opcije, odvojene razmakom ako se koristi kratka verzija ili znakom jednakosti `(=)` kad se koristi duga verzija; npr:

segment.source: `nvda -l 10` |Tells NVDA to start with log level set to debug
segment.target: `nvda -l 10` |proslijeđuje NVDA informaciju da se mora pokrenuti s razinom loga postavljenom kao debug

segment.source: `nvda --log-file=c:\nvda.log` |Tells NVDA to write its log to `c:\nvda.log`
segment.target: `nvda --log-file=c:\nvda.log` |određuje put do NVDA datoteke zapisnika na sljedeću vrijednost `c:\nvda.log`

segment.source: `nvda --log-level=20 -f c:\nvda.log` |Tells NVDA to start with log level set to info and to write its log to `c:\nvda.log`
segment.target: `nvda --log-level=20 -f c:\nvda.log` |proslijeđuje naredbu da se NVDA pokreće s razinom loga info i da zapisuje svoj log u `c:\nvda.log`

segment.source: Following are the command line options for NVDA:
segment.target: Slijede opcije naredbenog retka za NVDA:

segment.source: Short |Long |Description
segment.target: Kratka |Duga |Opis

segment.source: `-h` |`--help` |show command line help and exit
segment.target: `-h` |`--help` |Prikazuje pomoć u naredbenom retku i izlazi

segment.source: `-q` |`--quit` |Quit already running copy of NVDA
segment.target: `-q` |`--quit` |Zaustavlja trenutačno pokrenutu kopiju NVDA čitača

segment.source: `-k` |`--check-running` |Report whether NVDA is running via the exit code; 0 if running, 1 if not running
segment.target: `-k` |`--check-running` |Izvještava o pokrenutosti NVDA putem izlaznog koda; 0 ako je pokrenut, 1 ako nije pokrenut

segment.source: `-f LOGFILENAME` |`--log-file=LOGFILENAME` |The file where log messages should be written to. Logging is always disabled if secure mode is enabled.
segment.target: `-f LOGFILENAME` |`--log-file=LOGFILENAME` |datoteka u kojoj poruke zapisnika trebaju biti zapisane. Zapisivanje dnevnika je uvijek isključeno kada je sigurni način uključen.

segment.source: `-l LOGLEVEL` |`--log-level=LOGLEVEL` |The lowest level of message logged (debug 10, input/output 12, debug warning 15, info 20, disabled 100). Logging is always disabled if secure mode is enabled.
segment.target: `-l LOGLEVEL` |`--log-level=LOGLEVEL` |Najniža razina zapisivanih poruka u zapisniku (debug 10, ulaz/izlaz 12, debug upozorenje 15, info 20, onemogućeno 100). Zapisivanje dnevnika je uvijek isključeno kada je sigurni način uključen.

segment.source: `-c CONFIGPATH` |`--config-path=CONFIGPATH` |The path where all settings for NVDA are stored. The default value is forced if secure mode is enabled.
segment.target: `-c CONFIGPATH` |`--config-path=CONFIGPATH` |određuje mapu u kojoj su pospremljene sve postavke Podrazumjevana vrijednost je prisilno ako je uključen sigurni način.

segment.source: None |`--lang=LANGUAGE` |Override the configured NVDA language. Set to "Windows" for current user default, "en" for English, etc.
segment.target: Nema |`--lang=LANGUAGE` |Nadpisuje konfigurirani NVDA jezik. Postavljen na "korisnički zadan" za trenutnog korisnika podrazumjevano, "en" za engleski, itd.

segment.source: `-m` |`--minimal` |No sounds, no interface, no start message, etc.
segment.target: `-m` |`--minimal` |bez zvuka, bez sučelja, bez poruke dobrodošlice itd

segment.source: `-s` |`--secure` |Starts NVDA in [Secure Mode](#SecureMode)
segment.target: `-s` |`--secure` |Pokreće NVDA u [sigurnom načinu](#SecureMode)

segment.source: None |`--disable-addons` |Add-ons will have no effect
segment.target: nema |`--disable-addons` |dodaci neće imati utjecaja

segment.source: None |`--debug-logging` |Enable debug level logging just for this run. This setting will override any other log level ( `--loglevel`, `-l`) argument given, including no logging option.
segment.target: nema |`--debug-logging` |Omogućuje dijagnostiku samo pri trenutačno pokrenutoj kopiji. Ova postavka natpisuje bilo koju drugu razinu vođenja zapisnika ( `--loglevel`, `-l`) specificirani argument uključujući i opciju bez logiranja.

segment.source: None |`--no-logging` |Disable logging altogether while using NVDA. This setting can be overridden if a log level (`--loglevel`, `-l`) is specified from command line or if debug logging is turned on.
segment.target: nema |`--no-logging` |Potpuno isključuje vođenje zapisnika. Ova postavka može biti nadpisana ako razina loga ( `--loglevel`, `-l`) je specificiran iz naredbenog retka, ili je uključeno vođenje zapisnika.

segment.source: None |`--no-sr-flag` |Don't change the global system screen reader flag
segment.target: nema |`--no-sr-flag` |Ne mijenjaj glavnu zastavicu čitača ekrana u sustavu

segment.source: None |`--install` |Installs NVDA (starting the newly installed copy)
segment.target: nema |`--install` |Instalira NVDA, pritom pokrečući novoinstaliranu kopiju

segment.source: None |`--install-silent` |Silently installs NVDA (does not start the newly installed copy)
segment.target: nema |`--install-silent` |Tiho instalira NVDA (ne pokreće novu instaliranu kopiju)

segment.source: None |`--enable-start-on-logon=True|False` |When installing, enable NVDA's [Use NVDA during Windows sign-in](#StartAtWindowsLogon)
segment.target: nema |`--enable-start-on-logon=True|False` |Tijekom instaliranja, aktivirajte [opciju pokretanja NVDA čitača na ekranu za prijavu](#StartAtWindowsLogon)

segment.source: None |`--copy-portable-config` |When installing, copy the portable configuration from the provided path (`--config-path`, `-c`) to the current user account
segment.target: Nema |`copy-portable-config` |Prilikom instalacije, kopira se prijenosna kopija sa zadane lokacije (`config-path`, `-c`) u trenutnu korisničku mapu

segment.source: None |`--create-portable` |Creates a portable copy of NVDA (and starts the new copy). Requires `--portable-path` to be specified
segment.target: Nema |`--create-portable` |Stvara prijenosnu kopiju NVDA i pokreće ju. Zahtijeva definiran `--portable-path`

segment.source: None |`--create-portable-silent` |Creates a portable copy of NVDA (without starting the new copy). Requires `--portable-path` to be specified. This option suppresses warnings when writing to non-empty directories and may overwrite files without warning.
segment.target: Nema |`--create-portable-silent` |Stvara prijenosnu kopiju NVDA (bez njenog pokretanja. Zahijeva definiran `--portable-path`. Ova opcija utišava upozorenja prilikom pisanja datoteka u pune mape te može nadpisati datoteke bez upozorenja.

segment.source: None |`--portable-path=PORTABLEPATH` |The path where a portable copy will be created
segment.target: nema |`--portable-path=PORTABLEPATH` |Putanja za stvorenu prijenosnu kopiju

segment.source: System Wide Parameters
segment.target: Cijelosustavski parametri

segment.source: NVDA allows some values to be set in the system registry which alter the system wide behaviour of NVDA.
segment.target: NVDA omogućuje izmjenu nekih postavki u registru sustava, čime se mijenja ponašanje NVDA čitača u tom sustavu.

segment.source: These values are stored in the registry under one of the following keys:
segment.target: Te su vrijednosti spremljene u registru pod sljedećim ključevima:

segment.source: 32-bit system: `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\nvda`
segment.target: 32-bitni sustav: `"HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\nvda"`

segment.source: 64-bit system: `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\WOW6432Node\nvda`
segment.target: 64-bitni sustav: `"HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\WOW6432Node\nvda"`

segment.source: The following values can be set under this registry key:
segment.target: Sljedeće vrijednosti se mogu postaviti pod ovim ključem:

segment.source: Name |Type |Possible values |Description
segment.target: Naziv |Vrijednost |Moguće vrijednosti |Opis

segment.source: `configInLocalAppData` |DWORD |0 (default) to disable, 1 to enable |If enabled, stores the NVDA user configuration in the local application data instead of the roaming application data
segment.target: `configInLocalAppData` |DWORD |0 (Podrazumevano) da onemogućite, 1 da omogućite |Ako je omogućeno, Čuva NVDA podešavanja u lokalnim podacima aplikacija umesto roming podataka

segment.source: `serviceDebug` |DWORD |0 (default) to disable, 1 to enable |If enabled, disables [Secure Mode](#SecureMode) on [secure screens](#SecureScreens). Due to several major security implications, the use of this option is strongly discouraged
segment.target: `serviceDebug` |DWORD |0 (podrazumevano) da onemogućite, 1 da omogućite |Ako je omogućen, biće onemogućen [bezbedan način rada](#SecureMode) na [bezbednim ekranima](#SecureScreens). Zbog nekoliko ogromnih bezbednosnih rizika, korišćenje ove opcije se ne preporučuje

segment.source: `forceSecureMode` |DWORD |0 (default) to disable, 1 to enable |If enabled, forces [Secure Mode](#SecureMode) to be enabled when running NVDA.
segment.target: `forceSecureMode` |DWORD |0 (podrazumevano) da onemogućite, 1 da omogućite |Ako je omogućeno, nateraće NVDA da koristi [bezbedan režim](#SecureMode) pri pokretanju.

segment.source: Further Information
segment.target: Dodatne Informacije

segment.source: If you require further information or assistance regarding NVDA, please visit the [NVDA web site](NVDA_URL).
segment.target: Ako trebate više informacija ili pomoć sa čitačem ekrana NVDA, molimo posjetite [NVDA web stranicu](NVDA_URL).

segment.source: Here, you can find additional documentation, as well as technical support and community resources.
segment.target: Tamo je moguće naći dodatnu dokumentaciju, tehničku podršku i resurse zajednice.

segment.source: This site also provides information and resources concerning NVDA development.
segment.target: Ova web stranica sadržava informacije koje se tiču razvoja NVDA čitača.
